thread.title: Alabama's Tosh Lupoi is 247Sports' SEC Recuiter of the Year
thread.title_full: Alabama's Tosh Lupoi is 247Sports' SEC Recuiter of the Year

title: Alabama's Tosh Lupoi is 247Sports' SEC Recuiter of the Year
text:
Manage Alabama's Tosh Lupoi is 247Sports' SEC Recuiter of the Year Alabama co-DC Tosh Lupoi is the top recruiter in the SEC after helping the Tide land a trio of five-stars. Slot to Alabama Crimson Tide Links (Photo: 247Sports) 
Alabama co-defensive coordinator/outside linebackers coach Tosh Lupoi is the 247Sports Recruiter of the Year in the SEC after helping the Crimson Tide land the nation's top recruiting class. 
Click here for the full SEC rankings. 
Lupoi helped Alabama land five prospects in the 2017 class , including a trio of five-stars. He served as the primary recruiter for the nation's top running back, Najee Harris , top dual-threat quarterback, Tua Tagovailoa , and No. 2 outside linebacker, Dylan Moses . He also was the primary recruiter for All-American long-snapper Thomas Fletcher and the secondary recruiter for four-star defensive end Christopher Allen . 
A California native, Lupoi joined the Crimson Tide staff prior to the 2015 season. In the past, he's helped Washington land five-star Shaq Thompson and California reel in five-star safety Keenan Allen . 
Harris, the nation's No. 3 overall prospect, is the top recruit Lupoi has ever secured a commitment from. Author
